targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Co2ContentInterior")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "StateOfChargeBMS")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "StateOfChargeBMS")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Odometer")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BatteryVoltageHV" or r["_field"] == "BatteryCurrentHV" or r["_field"] == "Speed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BatteryCurrentHV" or r["_field"] == "BatteryVoltageHV")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Speed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Odometer")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Speed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BatteryCurrentHV" or r["_field"] == "BatteryVoltageHV")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BatteryTotalDischargeHV")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BatteryTotalChargeHV")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /${parameters:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "AccelerationPedalPos")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /\b${devices:regex}\b/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "BattTempMain"  or r["_field"] == "IndoorTemp" or r["_field"] == "OutdoorTemp")
  |> yield(name: "mean")
